official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating November 10, 1975, in commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the U.S. Marine Corps.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating November 10, 1975, in commemoration of the two hundredth anniversary of the United States Marine Corps.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating November 10, 1975, in commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the U.S. Marine Corps.
